name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cassandra Test Engineering Task Board addons

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds niceties to the Cassandra Test Engineering Task Board .

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This modifies the Cassandra Test Engineering Task Board to show the avatars of the people testing the tickets displayed, rather than the original assignee.
